content:
It sounds like you have a great taste in music! Coldplay and The Beatles are both iconic bands with a wealth of amazing piano-driven songs. Max Richter and Olafur Arnalds are also fantastic choices if you're looking for more atmospheric and contemporary piano music.

It's wonderful to hear that playing along to your favorite songs was easier than you expected! Muscle memory is a powerful thing, and it's great that you're able to tap into it. Keep practicing, and you'll be surprised at how quickly your skills will improve.

Composing your own melodies is a fantastic way to express yourself creatively, and it's amazing that you're giving it a try! Don't worry too much about whether your compositions are "worth sharing" or not – the act of creating music is what matters most. It's a great way to relax, express yourself, and tap into your imagination.

Remember, music is a journey, and it's okay to take things at your own pace. Enjoy the process of learning, experimenting, and creating, and don't be too hard on yourself if your compositions aren't perfect at first. The most important thing is that you're having fun and enjoying the experience.

Keep us updated on your progress, and feel free to share any of your compositions if you'd like feedback or just want to share your creativity with someone!
